I recently offered to talk at the local primary school, about my job (or at least part of my job).

Litmus test for your idea

If you want to know if your idea is any good, first check if you even have any interest in persevering. Try teaching before you try selling.

https://ninjasandrobots.com/litmus-test

What do you mean ‘we need more time’??

In tech, we spend little time talking about the softer skills like communication, project management, and prioritization.

https://blogs.dropbox.com/tech/2015/10/what-do-you-mean-you-need-more-time/

This is a web page
